oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Matter effects at long baseline experiments
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NARAYAN, M
SANKAR, SU
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: neutrino oscillations
3-flavor oscillations
solar
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We consider the effect of neutrino propagation through the matter of earth's crust on nu (mu) --> nu (e) oscillations in long baseline experiments within a three flavour oscillation framework. We show that, given the constraints from solar neutrino and CHOOZ data, matter effects enhance the mixing for neutrinos rather than for anti-neutrinos. To discern the matter effects, we need data from two different experiments with different baseline lengths (such as K2K and MINOS).
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: International Europhysics Conference on High Energy Physics (HEP 99),TAMPERE, FINLAND,JUL 15-21, 1999
